goal.en: Students taking this course will be able to apply the knowledge of electrodynamics in their daily life or research problems
goal.ch: 讓學生學會將電磁學知識應用於生活與研究的問題中

content.en:
1. Electromagnetic induction and time-dependent electromagnetic fields
2. Maxwell‘s equations in empty space
3. Maxwell‘s equantion in materials
4. Conservation laws
5. Propagation, reflection, and refraction of electromagnetic waves
6. Guided waves
7. Electromagnetic radiation
8. Electrodynamis in special relativity
content.ch:
1. 電磁感應與時變電磁場
2. 真空中的 Maxwell 方程組
3. 介質中的 Maxwell 方程組
4. 守恆定律
5. 電磁波的傳播、反射，與透射
6. 導波
7. 電磁輻射
8. 相對論中的電磁學

textbook.en: Introduction to Electrodynamics, 4th Ed. Author : David J. Griffiths
textbook.ch: Introduction to Electrodynamics 4th 版本 作者 David J. Griffiths

flex_desc.en: In the 1-16th weeks, I will teach all the topics listed above. The mid and final exams will also be implemented within this period of time. In the last 2 weeks I will introduce the application of electrodynamics in optics/photonics/metamaterials and answer questions

最後 2 周介紹電磁學在光學/光子學/超穎材料上的應用或解答相關問題
